duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop comprehensive project plans for construction projects, coordinate, track, and lead all teams involved to project completion, while providing ongoing clarity to the customer regarding project status.
Conduct pre-proposal scope reviews, select subcontractors/vendors, and build detailed product submittal packages for client approval before purchase orders are issued.
Schedule and conduct all necessary pre-construction meetings and perform regular site visits.
Manage product orders, deliveries, and related logistics, and meticulously track the status of every project.
Strategically guide projects to completion, create and maintain Gantt schedules, and coordinate daily check-ins and weekly status meetings.
Perform all necessary quality assurance/quality control measures before leading clients in final walkthroughs and prepare project closeout packages.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
